title: Nightbringer Yasou Icon and Border not showing after forge
body: I forge the Icon and border last week however did not receive either. It also gives me the option to forge it again and does not say owned like the others. Please help

replies.body: Weeeeeiiiiiird. Your hextech inventory does show that you crafted the border icon, but sometimes it just takes awhile for them to show up. Double check for that icon and let me know if you have it now or not!
Yeah i have the icon now thanks for that :)
